name: Golden Otter
description: Rare golden otter - special unlockable legendary character

textTo3DPreviewTask.prompt: Cute stylized river otter swimming pose, fluffy round body, small ears, whiskers, flat paddle tail, webbed feet, majestic regal expression, sparkle effect, game character, chibi proportions, low poly cartoon style
textTo3DPreviewTask.negativePrompt: realistic fur texture, scary, dark, detailed, hyper realistic, human features, tarnished

textTo3DRefineTask.texturePrompt: Brilliant shimmering golden fur coat with warm amber highlights, cream colored chest with golden glow, polished gold nose, gleaming amber eyes with sparkle, golden inner ears, magical luxurious appearance, stylized cartoon game textures with metallic sheen
